SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_ID = ? AND USER_LEVEL = ?
SELECT M.*, A.CHANGE_NAME, A.FILE_PATH FROM MEMBER M LEFT JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON (A.REF_UNO = M.USER_NO) WHERE USER_ID = ? AND USER_PWD = ? AND USER_LEVEL = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT M.*, A.CHANGE_NAME, A.FILE_PATH FROM MEMBER M LEFT JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON (A.REF_UNO = M.USER_NO) WHERE USER_NO = ? AND USER_ID = ? AND USER_LEVEL = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'

UPDATE MEMBER SET USER_ID = ?, USER_NAME = ?, PHONE = ?, ADDRESS = ? WHERE USER_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT FILE_NO FROM ATTACHEMENT WHERE CHANGE_NAME = ?
UPDATE ATTACHMENT SET ORIGIN_NAME = ?, CHANGE_NAME = ?, FILE_PATH = ?, UPLOAD_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE FILE_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'

UPDATE MEMBER SET USER_PWD = ?, MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE USER_NO = ? AND USER_PWD = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET NOTICE_CHECK = 'Y', MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE USER_NO = ?

SELECT M.*, A.CHANGE_NAME, A.FILE_PATH FROM MEMBER M LEFT JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON (A.REF_UNO = M.USER_NO) WHERE M.USER_NO = ?

SELECT MN.REF_UNO, MN.REF_CNO, INTERACTION_NO ,MN.REF_BNO, NOTICE_DATE, NOTICE_TYPE , M1.USER_NAME, M2.USER_NAME AS INTERACTION_NAME, CLASS_NAME, BOARD_TITLE FROM MEMBER_NOTICE MN FULL JOIN MEMBER M1 ON (M1.USER_NO = MN.REF_UNO) FULL JOIN MEMBER M2 ON (M2.USER_NO = MN.INTERACTION_NO) FULL JOIN CLASS C ON (C.CLASS_NO = MN.REF_CNO) FULL JOIN BOARD B ON (B.BOARD_NO = MN.REF_BNO) WHERE MN.REF_UNO = ?
